item.title: HOW TO CREATE NEW POSTS
item.description: WARNING: NEVER CHANGE THE [[main.manu]] blog TO OTHER THINGS IN ‘config.toml’ Make a banner image (1000*750 px), put it into static/img/banners/ Run blogdown::serve_site() in RStudio Change ‘Blogs’ to ‘Posts’ in public/blog/index.html TODO: Change ‘Blogs’ to ‘Posts’ automatically Try Netlify Thanks to ServiceMesher for the detailed instruction of the hugo-universal-theme
